alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Roane; Wirt; Wood (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 24 at 12:43AM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Meigs, western Wirt, northwestern Roane, Jackson and southwestern Wood Counties through 115 AM EDT... At 1243 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Forked Run State Park, moving south at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ripley, Spencer, Forked Run State Park, Ravenswood, Sandyville, Mineralwells, Reedy, Portland, Statts Mills, Peewee, Belleville, Reedsville, Palestine, Lucille, Evans, Davisville, Morristown, Rockport, Leroy, and Fairplain. This includes Interstate 77 in West Virginia between mile markers 127 and 171. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
